detail.description: Sanghi Industries Limited is engaged in the manufacturing and marketing of cement and cement products in domestic and export markets. The Companyâ€™s manufacturing facilities are at Sanghipuram, Gujarat. The company sells in Gujarat, Rajasthan, Maharashtra and Kerala and International Markets of the Middle East, Africa and the Indian subcontinent. It also sells Ready Mix Concrete in Ahmedabad and Rajkot markets.[1]
